title: Ra√∫l Grijalva
added: In February, Grijalva voted in support of the [[American Rescue Plan]], which included a nationwide $15 federal minimum wage increase.<ref name="Hansen">{{cite news |last1=Hansen |first1=Ronald J. |title=Arizona delegation votes along party lines as Democratic virus aid bill topping $1.9 trillion passes House |url=https://www.azcentral.com/story/news/politics/arizona/2021/02/27/how-arizona-house-delegation-voted-covid-19-relief-bill/6844747002/ |access-date=9 March 2021 |work=The Arizona Republic |date=27 February 2021}}</ref> The increase was removed from the bill by the [[Senate Parliamentarian]]. As a result, Grijalva joined a group of other progressive Democrats in calling for President Joe Biden to overturn the Parliamentarian's ruling.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Swanson |first1=Ian |title=Progressives push White House to overturn $15 wage ruling |url=https://thehill.com/homenews/house/540986-progressives-push-white-house-to-overturn-15-wage-ruling |access-date=9 March 2021 |work=TheHill |date=1 March 2021 |language=en}}</ref> Biden did not.
